title: De Boor's algorithm
summary: In the mathematical subfield of numerical analysis de Boor's algorithm[1] is a polynomial-time and numerically stable algorithm for evaluating spline curves in B-spline form. It is a generalization of de Casteljau's algorithm for BÃ©zier curves. The algorithm was devised by Carl R. de Boor.  Simplified, potentially faster variants of the de Boor algorithm have been created but they suffer from comparatively lower stability.[2][3]
